ARABIC: قَالُوٓا۟ أَجِئْتَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ أَمْ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّٰعِبِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'Have you brought us the truth or are you playing games?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "Are you speaking in earnest, or only jesting?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "Are you expressing your true ideas before us or are you jesting?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They exclaimed, "Have you brought the Truth or are you joking?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “Have you brought the Truth to us, or are you just making fun?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "Have you brought us the Truth, or are you one of those who play about"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Have you brought to us the truth, or are you one of the triflers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'What, hast thou come to us with the truth, or art thou one of those that play?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: Bringest thou unto us the truth, or art thou some jester?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "Have you brought us the truth or are you jesting?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: hast thou come unto us with the truth, or art thou of those who sport?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘Are you telling the truth, or are you [just] kidding?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said, "Have you brought us the Truth, or are you one of those who jest?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "Have you brought us the truth, or are you one of those who play about?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They said: 'Is it the truth you have brought us, or are you one of those that play'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “Are you telling us the truth, or are you just playing?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "Have you come to us with truth, or are you of those who jest?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:55] They said, ‘Do you bring us the truth, in that which you are saying, or are you being frivolous?’, in this regard.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said) to Abraham: (Bringest thou unto us the Truth) is what you say serious, Abraham, (or art thou some jester) or are you mocking us?
